sub_title: Executive Vice President Head of Enterprise Excellence Philips
summary:
Experienced business leader, experience in multiple industries, for the last 12 years focused on the Healthcare industry. Passionate about innovation, change, and developing people. Deeply interested in Healthcare IT, Interventional Cardiology and Radiology, Cardiac Electrophysiology, and Minimal Invasive Surgery.

Currently Senior Vice President and Business Leader of Image Guided Therapy Systems and EP Solutions at Philips. Philips is a leading health technology company and the global leader in image guided therapy.

I lead teams across the globe that develop, manufacture, market, and deliver the industryâ€™s leading interventional imaging solutions. Philips recently acquired EPD Solutions business is now also part of my responsibilities. Having previously led the diagnostic X-Ray business and the Cardiology Informatics business, I have overseen the development of solutions that distribute cardiology images and information, enable clinical reporting and workflow throughout the cardiac care cycle, and complement and interface to the Electronic Medical Record.

Specialisms: product development, interventional cardiology, (interventional) radiology, cardiac electrophysiology, image guided therapy, diagnostic X-Ray, workflow and reporting, business development, team development,  change management, and leadership
